name: Craftbyte Mod IDE
tagline: The Minecraft Mod Development IDE for Minecraft Mod Developers.
body:
### Welcome to our official GitHub website!
Hello! This is our official GitHub Website. Craftbyte Mod IDE is an Minecraft Mod Development IDE for Minecraft Mod Developers. It's written in VB.NET and some things in C#.

### Who is developing it?
ByteCrafter is developing it. 

### Features and Functions?
It has all features and functions like in a normal IDE. Only with more functions and features for developing Minecraft Mods!

### Official Minecraft Forum thread
Official Minecraft Forum thread: [Click here!](http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding/minecraft-tools/2420242-craftbyte-mod-ide-the-ide-for-mod-developers-not)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
